c1.name: A Lingering Flavor
c1.effect: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of Signature Mix end.

c2.name: Shaken, Not Purred
c2.effect: Increases Icy Paws' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%. Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the Icy Paws shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.

c3.name: Aâ€”Another Round?
c3.effect: Increases the Level of Signature Mix by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Wine Industry Slayer
c4.effect: Within the radius of Signature Mix, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%.

c5.name: Double Shot, On The Rocks
c5.effect: Increases the Level of Icy Paws by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Cat's Tail Closing Time
c6.effect:
Characters within Signature Mix's radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts:
- Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%.
- Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.
